website_summaries.verdict: A good value with an unheard of warranty for a kneeling pad, but if you need more cushioning, you probably want to spend a bit more on one of the thicker models on our list.
cons: At 3/4 inches thick, it's also thinner than most competing brands

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Basically a soft but firm foam rubber type of material feel. Protects those knees while working in the yard. Very light weighted. Seems durable. Only use one side of it since the side that goes to the ground seem to retain indentations from pebbles, mulch and other ground materials. Overall would recommend it although would try to get a thicker one if available.
customer_reviews.author: WasabiKid

customer_reviews.title: Dents easily but not a problem
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one for me and one for my mom because it is comfortable and large enough. (many are quite small) this quickly gets dents, so you will want to designate one side as the bottom to keep dents and dirt all on one side or it would get destroyed quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: This cushion is nice and thick
customer_reviews.text: This cushion is nice and thick, so helpful in that way for the knees. But, where I live there is a lot of gravel and I've had to use mine in that environment some and don't like the way puck marks get into the cushion and stay. I expected a different finish to the cushion for 'easy wipe of' cleanups so it does stain some. I like the handle on it real well. Have not used it as a seat cushion, but this would work well for that.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy F.

customer_reviews.title: Super soft, great price
customer_reviews.text: I love these kneeling pads. I've tried several, and this on just works for me. Nice blend of softness and firmness. No bad odor upon opening. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: PlaneDoc

customer_reviews.title: My knees are thankful...
customer_reviews.text: I have a need to kneel on the floor from time to time to attend to household chores and fixer upper projects. This cushion has made the process painfree. And somehow it seems easier to get up from the cushion. I no longer procrastinate attending to my project list because I would nee to kneel on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Budget price, budget quality
customer_reviews.text: You pay for what you get. It looks to break and tear easily, judging by the damage it sustained during shipping. I won’t be able to use it over the rocks by the garden bed for more than a day or two, but it will work next to the tub when I’m helping my kid wash his hair.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cox

customer_reviews.title: it slides on you
customer_reviews.text: This product does cushion your knees, however, it wants to slide around on you. So as you get the comfort you have to fight to stay in position to complete your task.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Does what it do
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Doesn't "sink" from pressure like others. Resilient. Doesn't give that weird "floating" effect when kneeling. Bigger than most Doesn't stick to knees/skin like the glossy types. Neutral color Removable hand grip notch for when holding. Or to eliminate hole when kneeling. CONS: It could use a quarter inch more thickness perhaps. Picks up dirt/dust more than the glossy types. The glossy types are more washable. I could care less however.
customer_reviews.author: Lander

customer_reviews.title: Too thin
customer_reviews.text: This is too thin to do the job well. It bends when you kneel on it unlike ones I have had in the past.
customer_reviews.author: CEH

customer_reviews.title: used for archaeology dig
customer_reviews.text: Got this for an archaeology dig and it did a great job cushioning my knees while spending a good portion of the day troweling. It did get somewhat slippery when slightly wet or muddy which was slightly irritating. I had surgery on my knee years ago and had a scar that runs across my knee cap. This pad did a nice job of cushioning it to not feel as sensitive as normal. Usually I cannot put weight on that knee at all when kneeling and was able to using this pad. well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lola Bird

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing foam. Not durable.
customer_reviews.text: Closer to styrofoam than a durable vinyl foam. When I pulled the tightly wrapped plastic off the cushion, the abrasion caused by the plastic left small tears along the edge. I doubt the durability of this cushion for garden use, and should have looked for something closer to what's used in children's pads.
customer_reviews.author: MindKTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: not as good as i thought
customer_reviews.text: Don't like the thickest of this pad. It's just not comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Bear

customer_reviews.title: Larger than most
customer_reviews.text: I rcvd my pad today. It is larger than any Ive purchased in the past, so I anticipate I will like it a lot more. I plan to keep it in the trunk of my car, to check tire pressure. The smaller ones Ive had in the past required careful aiming when I knelt down. The dimensions of mine are exactly: 17-5/8" X 10-3/4" X 3/4". If it were 1" thick it would be ideal. There are others offered on Amazon that 'are' 1" thick, but are much more expensive. I like the pleasant shade of Green.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, but rarely used
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted, but I rarely use it. I just get dirty and kneel in the dirt or squat for a better workout. I figure I have to wash the clothes anyway. However, for arthritic knees, this would be lovely. Very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Canoe Knee Pads
customer_reviews.text: I glued Velcro strips to the bottom of two of these and the bottom of my canoe and kneel on them as needed, whitewater, tight turns, etc. They are way less expensive and thicker than pads that are designed for this purpose. Used Vynabond to secure the velcro strips. Works great, and they run up the sides of the canoe floor a little so you can really lean the boat over.
customer_reviews.author: Swanny

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: Overall it is not bad, but it is not very durable when you start to use it in the garden. Overall, I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: R Harrison

customer_reviews.title: the rubber now pastes nice black spots on your knees (and pants)
customer_reviews.text: At first, this was a grate pad, but it has deteriorated to the point that it is unusable. After one year of living on my patio, the rubber now pastes nice black spots on your knees (and pants). Not so good. It should have lasted a lot long than one year.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth G. Wilk

customer_reviews.title: Easy on the knees.
customer_reviews.text: I like fiskars products, have always been pleased with them. This is easy on the knees, can be used both inside and outside.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia K. Suponcic

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all.
customer_reviews.text: Actually ordered these to use as spacers between my bed and the wall. Because my bed is under a window, if I want to shove it all the way against that wall, I can't push it equally as close to the adjoining wall. My bed is right in the corner. So I needed something to fit in the gap left at the head of my bed. This worked just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Janine Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing at Any Price
customer_reviews.text: These are too light, too hard, too fragile and don't nearly compare to other cushions which are more resilient, comfortable and durable. With others you may have to pay twice the price at a retail store but at least you will know ahead of time what you are buying and you will get much more for your money.
customer_reviews.author: b

customer_reviews.title: Just a piece of foam- but it works
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it's just a piece of foam with a hole in it, but it's light, it's tough, and it makes working on your knees much easier. I suppose you could recycle an old foam camping mattress into several kneepads,, but if you don't already have one to recycle, this works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Edelman

customer_reviews.title: right size
customer_reviews.text: well what can I say about kneeling mats other than I really like it. Right size and glad I was able to find this color. I use it all the time and it looks like it will last me a long time. Others I've bought before only lasted a year before falling apart. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: lyddo gonza

customer_reviews.title: good size, a little harder than one would like ...
customer_reviews.text: good size, a little harder than one would like the problem is the color - it will get lost in the garden gave it to my husband for his garage
customer_reviews.author: baker

customer_reviews.title: Useful for Lumbar Support
customer_reviews.text: Solid, well made pad that, when turned sideways, is just about the right size to use as my lumbar support cushion for my car seat.
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: Nice & cushey
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I'll give Fiscars thumbs up for this product. So far the cushion has outlasted my pruner and garden knife. Kind of strange. Foam vs. metal. I don't think you can goof up foam, but I could be wrong. The cushion is nice and wide, and the handle is handy, and the color is pleasant. It cleans off well and the thickness is a huge plus. It is the most important part of the product. I have bad knees so it helps to have a nice, thick and sturdy cushion. I use my cushion all the time and it has held its' shape very well. Without the cushion my knees are doomed. Fiscars, my knees thank you. H.
customer_reviews.author: Hilda Corley

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little pad. Works well and about the right price. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen25

customer_reviews.title: Nice large knew pad
customer_reviews.text: Very nice large knee pad that you can also lay on to cushion your back (if you have to fix the sink). However, if you leave it on the floor and your puppy comes along it could soon be shread into many small pieces. It is very light and easy for a puppy to carry away.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. M. Breach

customer_reviews.title: Why Do You Want a Headline? The Product Speaks for Itself.
customer_reviews.text: 1. Because I like the Fiskars Kneeling Cushion. 2. It's comfortable and easy to take along. 3. I have not used it much yet because the snow and ice preclude my going out doors to my garden.
customer_reviews.author: Peter in Sleepy Hollow

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Product, Lightweight, good density for comfort on knees. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Bruce F Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Right size, good quality
customer_reviews.text: These are the best cushions we have found. Worth the extra price. Just the right size. This is our second set.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie Heinzmann

customer_reviews.title: kind of flimsy
customer_reviews.text: This pad could be larger and thicker. It seems a little overpriced for what you get. When they say ultra light, they aren't kidding. I also left this outside for a couple of days by mistake. It survived, but was the worse for wear.
customer_reviews.author: E. S. Noyes

customer_reviews.title: Buy two - they are thin
customer_reviews.text: These things work well but you will need two. They are inexpensive so buy them in pairs. I bought 6 (garage, shed, house). They are wide enough and the length is good too.
customer_reviews.author: P. M. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Simple but effective
customer_reviews.text: These pads are useful where you must be on your knees a lot. If you must clean up, work on the car, or other activities where you must kneel, then having one or more of these pads might be a good idea.
customer_reviews.author: Beantown Jim

customer_reviews.title: knee pad
customer_reviews.text: ok for needed use, in house for cleaning wood floors
customer_reviews.author: djohn76

customer_reviews.title: does a GREAT job
customer_reviews.text: dense and great support for my bad knees. i use it everyday. thank you
customer_reviews.author: brad coe

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: It is good material but smaller than I anticipated. I should have looked closer at the size of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: we use this to kneel down by the bath tub when we give the baby a bath in the bathtub. it seems to be water resistent so it is therefore easy to clean after bath time.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Fiskars Garden large kneeling cushion
customer_reviews.text: The Fiskars large kneeling cushion is great for working in the garden. The cushion is much larger than I thought it would be so there is a lot of area to move around on. It is lightweight and easy to carry around. It would be comfortable to sit on at a stadium or on a hard bench for any length of time. It is a good deal for the amount of money paid. The only downside I found was that I would have preferred choosing my own color (blue) rather than getting an arbitrary color (yellow) from the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: jepster88

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like the width and material. I am very happy with this purchase. Fiskars gives a lifetime warranty with this which is an unexpected but nice surprise!
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: a little light weight
customer_reviews.text: I am a lineman. I visit a lot of underground pedestals. I purchased this item to throw on the ground to kneel on. I have had it for a few months now. It has held up pretty well. I wish it would have been a little beefier for the price tag. All in all a pretty nice item but wish it was tougher.
customer_reviews.author: N. DeTroye

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, washable surface
customer_reviews.text: The vinyl covered closed cell foam has a smooth surface and can easily be cleaned. The cushion is about 1" thick.
customer_reviews.author: grateful shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good size/quality, tho a bit expensive
customer_reviews.text: Good size for me (5'7" female landscaper), good quality. A bit expensive tho, for something so basic...
customer_reviews.author: hatter

customer_reviews.title: Really nice cushion
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and density of this cushion, it's a little larger and "cush-i-er" than some others I've had. And the color is good at hiding dirt!
customer_reviews.author: M.J.

customer_reviews.title: Help for gardening
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple pad that is durable and helps protect one's knees while knelling down and working in a garden. Inexpensive and functional!
customer_reviews.author: John T.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Was Looking For
customer_reviews.text: Pretty standard basic garden knee mat. Firm and sturdy. Yet provided adequate protection for my knees from the concrete and rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Knees aren't too good anymore and this really helps when I'm doing things around the house. The price was good as well, so I bought two.
customer_reviews.author: JerryM

customer_reviews.title: Firm but nice
customer_reviews.text: It's good. I would have like a little more cushion but it serves the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is great..... I am using it to sit on in the steam room at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Good to have
customer_reviews.text: This is one item that is necessary for me doing gardening. Such a practical solution and inexpensive. It simply works.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Lewis

customer_reviews.title: These pads are too hard
customer_reviews.text: Other reviewers have said to get two of these pads because they're thin; I tried that and it was not satisfactory because they are too hard. I prefer the Black & Decker 1707 Deluxe 1-1/4-Inch Thick Garden Kneeling Pad. You'll only need one of those.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Handy Product
customer_reviews.text: I had used this product in the past. Was very glad to find it on Amazon. I really like how light it is, as well as the handy handle.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Smith

customer_reviews.title: Better night's sleep
customer_reviews.text: I use it under my pillow, but I'm sure it would work on knees
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Large Kneeling Cushion
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I ordered these. They are larger and more efficent! The thickness is ideal too. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice size mat, giving as a gift, i'll buy another for myself. gs
customer_reviews.author: Captez

customer_reviews.title: kneeling cushion
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good quality, extra thick cushion that supports my weight. I really like using it when I garden.
customer_reviews.author: WALSH

customer_reviews.title: Knee comfort achieved
customer_reviews.text: This simple product does what it promises. If you need to protect your knees when you do work on our hands and knees this will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence S. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels
customer_reviews.text: Look and feels like it should. Maybe you can find it cheaper at a local store, but the product does hold up.
customer_reviews.author: DocLewis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Soft but nice and thick. It is useful for artificial knees.
customer_reviews.author: A recovering alcoholic

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: I use this in the bathroom to kneel on when I am giving my baby a bath. It is lightweight and easy to store. Feels great for my knees.
customer_reviews.author: shopper in chicago

customer_reviews.title: Great for working in the garden.
customer_reviews.text: My son uses this in the garden and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: ck

customer_reviews.title: Love Fiskars Tools
customer_reviews.text: Love Fiskars Tools. Every gardener must have one of these in there their gardening bucket. I was happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: It's almost weightless!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This pad is a little larger than most which allows you to move around without "falling" off. It's also incredibly light weight. Look out for gusting winds or you be looking for it down the block or across town.
customer_reviews.author: Denis J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Doctors love this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the vets to kneel on when they are working with pets. They love it. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Beth S.

customer_reviews.title: Kneeling Pad for RV
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this when he's setting up our motorhome. It really saves wear and tear on his knees.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite knee saver. Wish I had this when I was younger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good kneeler
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted good price and good function . I will use it often in the garden and yard.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: durable but dont leave them outside
customer_reviews.text: Works good for a sitting on logs while camping. Light weight enough to blow away in a wind gust (over my fence). Loved the color
customer_reviews.author: Kwoood

customer_reviews.title: substitute sent--no explanation
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the pictured knee pad because I have one and wanted another since it has been discontinued. You sent a substitute which was hard, not cushioned and would be no help for my bad knees. I returned it after 1 try.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Rock

customer_reviews.title: Love them! The only cushion I have found allowed ...
customer_reviews.text: Love them! The only cushion I have found allowed in NFL stadiums which is what I use them for. They make great seat cushions. I'm sure they are good for kneeling as well.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Pate

customer_reviews.title: GREAT cushion--saving my knees
customer_reviews.text: Great bargain for this product--it is thick and comfortable and a good way to save my knees and keep them clean at the same time
customer_reviews.author: sanpensacola

customer_reviews.title: Fiskars large ultra light kneeling pas
customer_reviews.text: Although very light, this product gives you good cushioning. We use it around the house. I'm not sure how it holds up outside.
customer_reviews.author: mcroft

customer_reviews.title: this knee cushion is to thin!!!! ...
customer_reviews.text: this knee cushion is to thin!!!! my knees are sore after using it each time. If it were thicker, then I believe it would relieve tension to your knees.
customer_reviews.author: ben sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pad
customer_reviews.text: Need a Pad get a pad. This one worked for me. find one that will work for you, Im sure amazon as many more to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: Picture is very deceiving!
customer_reviews.text: The picture showed 3 cushions in 3 different colors, at a price of about $7. There was no ability when ordering to indicate the color, so I figured the $7 was for all 3 cushions. When the package arrived, I was very surprised to find only one cushion, a yellow one. I have no idea how they thought I'd prefer the yellow color. I should have returned it for the $7 credit, but frankly the money was not enough to warrant taking the time. Stay away from this product!
customer_reviews.author: Technology Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product for tired knees
customer_reviews.text: Had one before. Left it out for the whole year. Winter climate changes made it crack. Bought two this time and will keep tham in the garage when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: D. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: picture deceiving
customer_reviews.text: i feel the picture of these pads is deceiving. for this price of almost $7 i thought there would be 3 pads; however, when i opened the box there was only one. i am very disapointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: moo

customer_reviews.title: Kneeler
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied - used them when washing kitchen floor. Nice that it has a way to hang it up when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Withers

customer_reviews.title: its a kneepad...
customer_reviews.text: what would you expect of it? it lies there... motionless... makes kneeling easier... doesnt talk back... its everything you expect from a kneepad...
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir Dancak

customer_reviews.title: Not what they apear to be
customer_reviews.text: First off the picture makes it seem like you get 3 kneeling Cushions, but it' only one. The cushion is thin and not worth the money at all, a towel under my knees would have worked better.
customer_reviews.author: Roadking

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver for Your Knees
customer_reviews.text: Product is a life saver on my knees, but you will need to purchase more than one. Although the product description states large, the size isn't the type of large I imagined. Two works fine for me and I like that they are easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: P. Randall

customer_reviews.title: Fiskars 9421 Large Ultra Light Kneeling Cushion
customer_reviews.text: I have really found this to be a handy item on float trips, not gardening. When I am out on the river and we stop to swim or have lunch, I use it as a flotation device in shallow water, or better yet, I sit on it on the gravel bars. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Brigid Murphy

product_meta.title: Fiskars 94216974J Ultralight Kneeling Cushion, 11 by 18-Inch
product_meta.description:
Fiskars 94216974J Ultralight Kneeling Cushion, 11 by 18-Inch

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Fiskars 94216974 Large Ultra Light Kneeling Cushion is a light, tough, resilient cushion and a perfect example of how Fiskars puts more thought, more quality and more performance into every item they offer. While most foam cushions collapse with little use and soak up water like a sponge, Fiskars uses durable EVA foam that protects knees from hard, rough, cold or damp surfaces. Plus, it won't absorb moisture, resists rips and withstands abrasions for seasons of comfortable use. Ideal for gardening, it's also handy for refinishing floors, cleaning out the fireplace, organizing under the kitchen sink, and any other job that brings you to your knees. Sized at 11 inches wide by 18 inches long by 3/4-inch thick, it fits handily in a garden tool caddy or hangs neatly on the wall via the convenient carrying handle.
feature_bullets: A long-lasting, easy-on-the-knees foam cushion great for gardening, cleaning, and construction projects
Resilient EVA foam won't absorb moisture and resists rips and abrasion
Measures 11-inches wide by 18-inches long by 3/4-inch thick

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars185 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
